Text.Page:
Sorcha is a junior researcher full of crazy ideas! After listening to Eria talk about some ridiculous prophecy, she went off alone determined to tap into the power of the Tainted Gorge.

It's been some time since she checked in, and I'm worried. Can I count on your assistance in bringing her back in safely? Well, you and a few more friends...

Sorcha brought a mobile teleport stone with her, so Hermaiorni can do a clever bit of triangulation and teleport you there. But hurryâ€”who knows what trouble she's in?

Talk to Teleport Master Hermaiorni, and she'll send you onward. And do not forget to gear up for unexpected battles.

Sorcha...always in such a rush. Eria and I told her the time was not right to act on the prophecy, but there was no stopping her.

If you and your team are ready, I can definitely get you out to her last known position.
